venue.name: across the street from Raynham Liquor

item.description:
hi there!

this may be short notice to some of you, but i wanted to get all the details. there is a wine tasting (liqour & apps too--turkey themed?) sponsored by the raynham liqour store on rte 44 this thursday night. it's held in the building across the street at 473 south street west in raynham (almost across the street from their liquor store). it starts at 5:30 pm & ends at 8:30pm. i've spoken to one of my friends, who attended last year, she had a blast! lots of people & for this years event, all proceeds will be donated to program of human services. yes, you have to buy tickets before hand for $15.00 but you can purchase them at the door for $20.00 too. i will e-mail you my telephone number (just in case you get lost) once i find out who is coming & exactly how many. just let me know by 2pm thursday. we can meet at the door outside. it's sure to be a great time!

p.s.if you have any further questions concerning the event (ie. vendors, etc.) you can call raynham liquor store directly at 508-823-0887

see you there!

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Raynham Liquor Wine Tasting
